name: CreativeFlow
signal_source: Design community: 'I lose 2 hours a day just switching between Figma, Slack, Notion, and file management'
description: Unified creative project workspace that integrates design tools, feedback, and project management in one context-aware interface
target_user: Freelance designers and small creative teams juggling multiple tools for each project
pain_point_evidence: Creative professionals reporting productivity loss from constant context switching and file management overhead
differentiation: First creative workspace designed around projects rather than individual tools
subscription_fit: Tiered pricing based on project volume and team collaboration features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free single project tier, premium unlocks unlimited projects and team features
